\begin{lstlisting}
%%Begin to test the Cholesky decompostion
%
fprintf("test1, n =3\n");
test = randn(3)
L = Cholesky(test)
L = L'

fprintf("test2, n=4\n");
test = randn(4)
L = Cholesky(test)
L = L'

fprintf("test3, n=5\n");
test = randn(5)
L = Cholesky(test)
L = L'
%
\end{lstlisting}
